abstract: Superior Court Judge Orlando Hudson Jr rules Craig Hicks, charged with first-degree murder in North Carolina for killing Muslim students Deah Shaddy Barakat, Yusor Mohammad Abu-Salha and Razan Mohammad Abu-Salha over a parking dispute, is eligible to face death penalty trial.
lead_paragraph: The man charged with killing three Muslim college students will face a death penalty trial after prosecutors told a judge they had strong and incriminating evidence.

headline.main: North Carolina: Death Penalty Sought for Students’ Killing
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Death Penalty Sought for Students’ Killing

snippet: The man charged with killing three Muslim college students will face a death penalty trial after prosecutors told a judge they had strong and incriminating evidence.
